publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3365 Peter Peacock: BBC Scotland Young Traditional Musician 2009—That the Parliament congratulates Nairn-based fiddler Ruairidh Macmillan on winning the BBC Scotland Young Traditional Musician of the Year for 2009; praises all six finalists on their skill and talent, and wishes them all every success in keeping the traditional musical heritage of Scotland alive and vibrant.
S3M-3365 BBC Scotland Young Traditional Musician 2009 (lodged on 2 February 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-3365 Peter Peacock: BBC Scotland Young Traditional Musician 2009—That the Parliament congratulates Nairn-based fiddler Ruairidh Macmillan on winning BBC Scotland’s Young Traditional Musician of the Year for 2009; praises all six finalists on their skill and talent, and wishes them all every success in keeping the traditional musical heritage of Scotland alive and vibrant. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn
S3M-3365 BBC Scotland Young Traditional Musician 2009 (lodged on 2 February 2009) Jack McConnell*
S3M-3365 BBC Scotland Young Traditional Musician 2009 (lodged on 2 February 2009) David Stewart*
S3M-3365 BBC Scotland Young Traditional Musician 2009 (lodged on 2 February 2009) Karen Whitefield*
